measures.name: Sprzedaż PLUS PLN (Line)
Line ma pasujący ModelCode
measures.expression:
VAR ListaPasujacych =
    FILTER (
        VALUES ( 'Product'[Model Code] ),
        RIGHT ( 'Product'[Model Code], 4 ) = "PLUS"
            || 'Product'[Model Code] IN {
                "MTLBOARDMFCORGC",
                "MTLBOARDMFCORGD",
                "MTLBOARDFENIXRC",
                "MTLBOARDFENIXRD",
                "MTLBOARDMFCRC",
                "MTLBOARDMFCRD"
            }
    )
RETURN
IF ( COUNTROWS ( ListaPasujacych ) > 0, 1, 0 )
